author: Samsung
description:
Smarter conversations. Seamless control.
With Samsung Vision AI Companion, your TV becomes more than a screen — it’s your everyday helper. 💬

👉 To start:
1️⃣   Press the AI button on the remote.
2️⃣   Ask your companion anything — from what’s on your mind to what’s on your screen.
3️⃣   Watch as Samsung Vision AI Companion brings answers, ideas, and entertainment right to your living room. 🌟

That’s the power of Samsung Vision AI Companion — simplifying, enhancing, and empowering your day. 🚀

#VisionAICompanion #SamsungVisionAI #VisionAI #SamsungAITV #AITV
title: How to use Samsung Vision AI Companion
